title: U2 Live Elevation Tour
description:
"Be There Forever"
U2 Live - Madison Square Garden, NY, NY 
October 27, 2001

U2 perform live in New York City shortly after 9/11.  Includes post-9/11 versions of "Please" and "New York", plus rare covers of "When Will I See you Again" and "What&#039;s Going On".  At the end of the show about 100+ members of the NYPD and FDNY get on stage with the band and take turns speaking to the audience, pledging the city their support, and remembering lost comrades and loved ones.  Eventually they coax Bono and crew back on stage for amazing extra encore featuring "Out Of Control".  A truly one of a kind U2 show (even more than usual).

1. Elevation intro
2. Elevation
3. Beautiful Day
4. Until The End Of The World
5. New Years Day
6. I Will Follow
7. Sunday Bloody Sunday
8. When Will I See You Again
9. Stuck In A Moment
10. Kite
11. Angel of Harlem
12. Please (acoustic)
13. Bad (w/ 40 / Ps 119)
14. Where The Streets Have No Name
15. I Still Haven&#039;t Found What I&#039;m Looking For
16. Pride (In The Name Of Love)
17. Bullet The Blue Sky
18. What&#039;s Going On
19. New York
20. One
21. Peace On Earth
22. Walk (w/ NYPD & FDNY)
23. Out Of Control
